d1_text:
Npc0512:
ï¿½Yeah, I worked for the zombies,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but I betrayed them too.[PAUSE 20]  I'm a con man, so I know the score.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Belch gives life to the zombies, but Belch works for Giygas,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½who I heard might be female.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Well, I'm not really sure whether Giygas is a male or a female.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm a helpful con man, don't you think?[HALT][END]
